thread.title: The tables are turned: Bernie Sanders spoofs Larry David with his own impression of Curb Your Enthusiasm star - Fun
thread.title_full: The tables are turned: Bernie Sanders spoofs Larry David with his own impression of Curb Your Enthusiasm star - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: The tables are turned: Bernie Sanders spoofs Larry David with his own impression of Curb Your Enthusiasm star - Fun
text: Larry David made quite a splash spoofing Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders on Saturday Night Live over the weekend â€“ and now the tables are turned.Sanders was goaded into trying out his own impersonation of the curmudgeonly Curb Your Enthusiasm comedian last night on Jimmy Kimmel Live!Echoing David's beloved catchphrase when asked if he liked the SNL impression, Sanders quipped: "I thought it was pretty, pretty, pretty good!"If this presidential campaign business doesn't work out for Bernie in the long run, he could definitely sub in for Larry on Curb Your Enthusiasm season nine.Jimmy Kimmel Live continues its hijinks weeknights on ABC.
